page.title: 17RECREATION IN FENNY COMPTON.
page.content: For adults, there is a {VILLAGE {PLAYING FIELD } with a football pitch a cricket pitch & a play area for children,with swings & a slide.The {SCHOOL FIELD }has two footbal pitches running tracks,long & high jump pits, & an Adventure Playground for children {FENNY MARINE} has a hire fleet,& there is fishing in the Oxford Canal & Marina. Almost all householders are keen gardeners,& spend much time in tending lawns,flowerbeds & vegetable gardens. Indoors, {TELEVISION} forms an important part of domestic life,& most families have music centres, several radios & record or cassette players;compact discs are becoming popular.Walking,jogging & cycling are fairly common for exercise,and there are some private tennis courts.The nearest swimming pool is in Banbury, the ice rink is in Birmingham.
